Government Tender Announcement
-----------------------------

### W6853-231001 Propane Services

**Tender Reference:** WS3922929066-Doc3923141825

**Publication Date:** 2023-03-22

**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-05-02T14:00:00

**Contract Term:** Four (4) years, with two (2) one (1) year option periods

**Contracting Entity:**

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada

**End-Use Entity:**

* Department of National Defence (DND)
* Address: 101 Colonel By Dr,Ottawa,Ontario,K1A0K2,Canada

**Required Services:**

The Department of National Defence is seeking the provision of liquefied petroleum gas (LPG or propane) supply, transportation, delivery, and offloading to a contractor-owned tank at the Trinity Hangar building, located at 115 Archibald St, Yellowknife, NT, as per the National Standards of Canada Specification CAN/CGSB-3.14-2013. The contracted services are for a period of four (4) years, with two (2) one (1) year option periods.

**Technical Specifications:**

* Liquefied petroleum gas (LPG or propane)
* National Standards of Canada Specification CAN/CGSB-3.14-2013

**Contractor Responsibilities:**

* Maintenance and repairs of the tank at no charge to the Crown

**Bid Submission:**

* All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by 2023-05-02T14:00:00

Note:
Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All bids submitted after 14:00 HAE on 2023-05-02 will be declared non-responsive.

**Contact Information:**

* Willy Zumbado Diaz (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [willy.zumbadodiaz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:willy.zumbadodiaz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Additional Information:**

Please visit [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15776104?extsite=MTU3NzY
